title: üõ†Ô∏è How to Configure VelocityOne FlightSystem Quadrant for MSFS 2024: Step-by-Step Guide! üöÄ
description:
In this video, we provide a detailed, step-by-step guide on how to configure the VelocityOne FlightSystem Quadrant for Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 (MSFS 2024). The default configuration is almost unusable, so follow along as we show you how to set up your controller for the best flight simulation experience. Whether you're a seasoned pilot or new to the flight sim community, this tutorial will help you get the most out of your VelocityOne FlightSystem Yoke. Don't miss out on optimizing your setup and enhancing your flight sim adventures!

00:00 - Intro
00:18 - Intro video
00:28 - What are all those profiles
01:22 - Creating the profiles
02:48 - Configuring the levers and buttons
14:05 - Testing
19:47 - Changing the default profile
20:20 - Outro

If you are looking for steps how to configure the yoke, check this video:
